title: Object-Oriented Programming Education Using Generative AI-Assisted Sequential Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Programming Concepts and Possession of Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Mid-level professional learners in managerial/leadership roles performing projects using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can complete hands-on projects applying OOP design principles (encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism) using generative AI tools.
Learners can diagnose and correct code errors through AI-assisted feedback with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve design efficiency to at least a three-level standard through collaborative code reviews in team-based PBL activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
